title: Opinion: Ineos Grenadiers Under Pressure to Deliver Tour de France Home Run
content:
It's crunch time for the Ineos Grenadiers, but who will the UK super team back as leader for the Tour de France? Jeremy Whittle looks at the options.

Read the full article at Opinion: Ineos Grenadiers Under Pressure to Deliver Tour de France Home Run on Velo.
author: ahood
